title: HOUR 2 - Rodgers, Watson, Brady
itunes:title: HOUR 2 - Rodgers, Watson, Brady
description:
More on Davante Adams choosing the Raiders over the Packers

Tom Brady and the Dolphins reportedly working on a deal

Deshaun Watson speaks to the media

Colin gives his NFL predictions for next season


Guest: Sage Rosenfels
